summary: Two teenagers, a trolley ticket controller, a couple separating. Everyday, cross-cutting stories in an Athens with constant power outages.
cast: Prometheus Aleifer|Omiros Poulakis|Vangelis Mourikis|Tasos Nousias|Kora Karvouni|Aggeliki Anagnostopoulou|Marilena Savvakou|Lida Sivissidi|Yorgos Roussakis|Anna Marangaki|Thanos Mitropoulos|Panagiotis Antypas|Giorgos Georgopoulos|Kostas Kourtaras|Nikos Margaris|Kostas Georgopoulos|Androniki Vasilouli|Fotis Papatheodorou
title: Tungsten
